Shupa Shoes

Shupa is a shoe eCommerce app provides variety of styles and colors all in one application. It basically helps the user by looking through all the options available by easy navigation and find the ideal footwear they were looking for at their fingertips. This app is for all types of people, let them be office workers, athletes, kids, etc. Access to different sizes to choose from whichever is right fit for you. Easy access to checkout and place the order. Shipping available for all over United Sates and free delivery over certain amount.

TIMELINE

2 Weeks

PLATFORM

Mobile app

TOOLS

Adobe Xd, Illustrator, Photoshop, Google Forms, Paper & Pen


MY ROLE

Competitive and comparative analysis, user journey, sketches, wireframes, user interface, interactive prototype.

Problem solving

While browsing the different footwear apps like Nike, Adidas, DSW. I realized the navigation is quite a struggle to get to your specific desired product, it was rather complicated. Shifting from vertical to horizontal navigation and finding main options after scrolling way down was not as pleasant of an experience.

Another problem observed is finding the right shoe size.When I need to purchase shoes is even worse as I have to deal with the sizing problem Not just lengthwise but considering the different width of feet aswell. Usually shoe are ended up being returned if shoe doesn't fit the customer right.

Target Audience

Everyone who loves footwear

Interview Insight

People close to me like my friends and family have shared their frustration of not being able to buy shoes online that easily because of stress of finding a right shoe size and they do not want to go through the hassle of returning them and wasting their precious time. Besides, it is good to highlight that even if in many cases the return is free. This is how my research began to find a solution that can improve the user’s experience when buying shoes online and that can somehow help to reduce the frustrations

“I like to shop online from app but I usually wait for the refund of the previous purchase to buy something else! It’s almost an obsession” “I prefer to go out for shopping, if i get enough time, else I endup doing online shopping as I know that I can return the item for free”.

“ Option to buy online for me depends a lot on the return policy. If it is not free of cost then I do not buy the product” “Sometimes I find my favorite shoe, but in real it is not as I thought and once worn I don’t like it anymore, and I return it” “I love shoes and even if I prefer go to the shop to try them on, I often end up buying online becasue some model is not available at the store, even thouh i know the risk of getting the wrong size”
So research has brought alot of points to light,not only related to the issue of finding product in reality,but also size of it, in many cases, the problem is not being able to see how the product fits.

Designer Goals

  • The main goal is to design simple and to achieve efficient product
  • Help users to find their right shoe size
  • Create clean information architecture that is organized to help users easily find what they’re searching for.
  • Smooth browsing and purchasing process.
  • To improve user experience & reduce unnecessary trouble in operation.
  • To make the purchase more pleasant.

Client Goals

The website needs to enable the client to:

  • Achieve elegant design to attract the user.
  • For the user to easily find their correct shoe size.
  • The design to be introduced which would help users to find their desired product easily.
  • Save their valuable time during the process.
  • Refresh the look and feel to reflect the high-end brand, comparitive to competetive brands.

Functions

  • Easy and simple navigation for seamless experience.
  • Provides variety of different colors, styles and size of shoes.
  • Simpler chart for size guidance
  • Place order to checkout with ease and shipping available all over USA
  • Questions are answered on live chat options.

Prioritizing eCommerce Process

The app is enable to fullfill requirements according to client and user needs

MUST HAVE

  • Simple and clear Navigation
  • Single product pages
  • A multi-product basket
  • Guide for shoe size
  • Product availability notification
  • Easy trending and sale/clearance offers

Sketches of UserFlow

The next step is, deciding the user’s flow to create the Information architecture of the App so to give a meaningful structure to the content the user is going to interact

Final SiteMap

After getting some positive feedback and suggestions about choosing a user flow from 4 real users, I finally come to decision that first sketch is structured with a clear idea of what are the steps one can easily follow.

Wireframe

Before begining to design the UI, sketch & wireframes are created to test them on a few target users.

Final UI

Using all the best practices gained after analyzing the needs of the user, it was decided to get to the final stage of creating the most understandable design using the apropriate identity of the brand and modern trends of minimalism.
By logging in, user can browse easily and look for their favorite shoes. On product page, they can enter their foot measurements to the size guide, to find their perfect pair and minimize the hustle of exchange/return as a result.
User can immediately add their product to the basket and then always return back to homepage if they want, by clicking the main logo or click search to look for other products, orelse simply make a purchase.

Summary

The final part of all the design thinking process is to test my prototype with real users. I tested “Shupa“ app with 5 users and overall, their feedback has been very positive. They all found it very useful with good aesthetics.
From a simplified navigation to creating a straight forward shoe fit quiz, It is easy to understand that, above design choice is definitely a try to improve personalized shopping experience and to reduce the effect of returns as to benefit the company.

Learnings
Even if all feedbacks were positive, I still believe as the next step can do more improvements and make some changes to the layout of size guide and quiz to make it even more simpler and easy to use.
